local_intent: Detect the T-block, move to a 2 cm standoff above it, and confirm visibility before further alignment.
assumptions: t_block is detectable within three attempts
Collision-free path exists to the above-block pose
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase: retries perception of the block, executes MoveAbove with offset_z=0.02 and timeout consistent with GLOBAL_BT, and verifies visibility before subsequent alignment/contact.
